summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/02/20 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['William Asher', 'Richard Michaels', 'R. Robert Rosenbaum', 'Richard Kinon', 'E.W. Swackhamer', 'Jerry Davis', 'Howard Morris', 'David Orrick McDearmon', 'William D. Russell', 'Luther James'], 'Studio': ['ABC Network']} Review Text: dislike the fact that Amazon cut the episodes you watch for free, They did it to Murder she wrote too.
I have the DVd;s I just thought it was easy to watch on prime.
so they get you interested, then if you want to watch more you pay for it. not here, thanks I already pay for prime membership and extra channels, you cut episodes from the things I like to watch. I am getting pretty disgusted with prime video. Review Title: once again they cut what you can watch Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Murder, She Wrote Review Date: 2020/02/20 Categories: Suspense, Drama Product Description: ['Angela Lansbury stars as Jessica Fletcher, a celebrated mystery writer whose penchant for solving crimes leads her into bizarre and colorful adventures.'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Starring': ['Angela Lansbury', 'Linda Blair', 'Tom Bosley']} Review Text: Amazon once again has cut things I like to watch, this is 3 for three in a month. Now this only goes to season five. Review Title: only goes to season five Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit Review Date: 2020/06/06 Categories: Suspense, Drama Product Description: ["Season 6 pushes hot-topic issues to the limit with provocative storylines and performances from the show's cast and guest stars."] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Platt', 'Jean de Segonzac', 'Peter Leto', 'Alex Chapple', 'Juan José Campanella', 'Constantine Makris', 'Norberto Barba', 'Martha Mitchell', 'Arthur W. Forney', 'Michael Pressman'], 'Starring': ['Christopher Meloni', 'Mariska Hargitay', 'Dann Florek']} Review Text: this was all free all episodes and seasons to 20 when I started to watch it, now in the middle they start wanting to charge you at season 6, seriously bad move. Amazon does this quite often to series TV and seasonal . I am sick and I do not sleep at night, so i watch a lot of TV, It was comforting but not when you do this kind of crap.
no way i am giving you more money for this crappy ploy. keep your video and i keep my money.
1.99 per episode and 24.99 per season is ridiculous. I am sick of Amazon doing this. Review Title: sick of the changes Amazon does when you start to watch something, then they charge for the rest Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2023/01/10 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jessie Nelson'], 'Producers': ['Paula Mazur', 'Steve Tisch', 'Jessie Nelson'], 'Starring': ['Whoopi Goldberg', 'Ray Liotta', 'Tina Majorino'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: I have always loved this movie, the three key characters are just wonderful actors. Who ever chose them for this . they did a lovely job on this movie, I watch it several times the the year. I love Whoopi, she is so great.
The music is fun, along with Jevetta Steele, who sings over the Rainbow, her voice is so beautiful, makes my heart melt. I often rewind just to hear her again. She sang her heart out in this one. A classic movie that stole my heart. Review Title: Great Movie Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Review Title: Great Movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The analysis of the purchase history reveals a strong preference for drama and suspense genres, particularly mystery and crime series. The individual consistently expresses frustration over Amazon's pricing strategy and content access restrictions, indicating a low tolerance for perceived unfair monetization practices, such as paying for additional content after initial access. This sentiment is underscored by repeated low ratings for products where access was limited or altered.

Quality is a significant factor, as evidenced by high ratings for movies and shows featuring well-regarded actors and meaningful storytelling, reflecting appreciation for strong performances and emotional resonance in content. The individual is engaged in binge-watching, likely due to their insomnia, emphasizing the importance of comprehensive access to entire series without cost barriers.

Price sensitivity is prominent, as the reviewer clearly articulates dissatisfaction with additional charges for later seasons and episodes. There is a recurring theme of loyalty to familiar and beloved shows, yet a strong aversion to being charged unexpectedly or having content altered post-viewing initiation.

Overall, the core preferences highlight a desire for accessible, high-quality video content in the drama genre, aligned with a willingness to pay for value but a strong resistance to perceived exploitation by streaming services.

target_interaction.title: Lots of twists and turns Great Mini series
target_interaction.text: Great Mini series, love it,  powerful and dynamic.  I did not like the daughter at first, and then she grew on me, wow is she a powerful actress. Love her now!!  It is a complex drama, not sure where they are going with this, I hope it ends happy, so much struggle, it keeps you on the edge of your seat.  The characters are incredibly talented actors/actresses. I know not everyone is into cowboy theme, but this is so good, one must give it a chance if you can take the intensity. Costner outdid himself on this .
